When I’m not outside in the field for research, I'm outside as an avid nature photographer. I love both wildflowers and birds, and with the great diversity of both in California, I'm always pursuing something in season. For a sampling of my photography, explore my [iNaturalist highlights](https://www.inaturalist.org/faves/lglevanik) or [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/outdoor.naturalist).
